title: Windsurf Wave 13 and Latest Updates
description: Windsurf continues rapid development with Wave 13 released, featuring ongoing enhancements to the AI coding editor.

title: Infosys Strategic Partnership
description: Infosys and Cognition announced strategic collaboration on January 7, 2026 to deploy Devin AI across global enterprises, integrating with Infosys Topaz platform for automating brownfield engineering and reducing tech debt.

community_feedback.quote: Thoughts on a month with Devin

title: Telemetry and Monitoring Enhancements
description: Google announced major updates to Gemini CLI on January 7, 2026 focusing on pre-configured Google Cloud monitoring dashboards, OpenTelemetry integration, and enhanced telemetry features including usage analytics and performance monitoring.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Available in Copilot
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse through GitHub Copilot integration as of January 6, 2026.

community_feedback.quote: When will you add Gemini 3 Flash to Copilot IntelliJ?

title: Autonomous Agents for App Modernization
description: Microsoft announced autonomous agents in GitHub Copilot for application modernization as part of January 2026 partner updates.

title: Claude 4 Launch with Opus 4 and Sonnet 4
description: Anthropic released Claude 4 family including new top coding models Opus 4 and Sonnet 4, with Microsoft integration announced for January 2026.

community_feedback.quote: Google Principal Engineer revealed Claude Code recreated in one hour what took a Google engineer a year to accomplish
I write and ship code 20-50x faster than I did 5 years ago

title: 2026 Planning and Feature Improvements
description: Claude Code team announced focus for 2026 on improving existing features, rolling out new improvements, and enhancing AI-assisted development capabilities.

title: Version 0.21.0 Release
description: Released December 15, 2025 with automatic session management and enhanced Google Cloud integration capabilities.

title: Holiday 2025 Release - Bug Fixes and Stability
description: Released December 22, 2025 with focus entirely on bug fixes and stability improvements including Core Agent enhancements, layout controls improvements, and code diff viewing enhancements.
